descriptionHtml:
Manshima Alantin
presents

Light Spells
7 new spells from the Alteration school that expand upon the Candlelight spell


Fire and Forget - 5 minute duration:
Torchlight - 2x radius of Candlelight
Lanternlight - 4x radius of Candlelight
Sunlight - 10x radius of Candlelight

Channelled:
Channelled Candle
Channelled Torch
Channelled Lantern
Channelled Sun

Language : English
Requirements : None

* Story *
Most ENBs tune the dungeon and night light levels WAY down.  These spells help to conteract that.


* Installation *
Download with Nexus Mod Manager 
-or-
Download the .rar file, unpack it and the files into your Skyrim/Data folder, then check it
into the game launcher menu (Data Files)

The spell tomes for these spells are sold by any merchant who sells Alteration spell tomes.  The Spell Tomes are leveled, i.e. Candle at skill 0, Torch at skill 25, etc...

* Uninstall *
Uncheck or delete the .esp file.

* Details *
I got tired of smaking my head against various rocks and walls whilst dungeon diving, and remembered that in Oblivion there was a spell to give the player night vision. After much research I made these spells to help players out.

* Bugs *
I am far from perfect, so something could be missed of course. I will gladly take care about your reports and constructive criticism.


* If you like *
Endorsements are welcome indeed, do not forget to vote! Thanx in advance.




Enjoy!
author: Manshima Alantin
